results.title: Renewable energy – powering a safer future
results.snippet: Switching to clean sources of energy, such as wind and solar, helps address not only climate change but also air pollution and health.

results.title: Renewable Energy Is Key to Fighting Climate Change
results.snippet: Jul 26, 2016 — Renewable energy is one of the most effective tools we have in the fight against climate change, and there is every reason to believe it will succeed.

results.snippet: Aug 7, 2021 — Renewable energy technologies, such as advanced biofuels for transportation, are key for U.S. efforts to mitigate climate change.
